name: badges

actions.name: Run Script

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: Type Any Valid Roblox Username

parameters.name: TimeMode
parameters.description: Change the output date type (1/1/1970 or 15000 days ago)

parameters.name: Creator
parameters.description: Type part of the creator name of the game for more accurate results (E.g. Sharkbyte)

parameters.name: ShowDisabled
parameters.description: Show Badges that are no longer obtainable. (TRUE = Default)

parameters.name: ShowUnowned
parameters.description: Show Badges that are in game but you do not own them. (FALSE= Default)

parameters.name: Game
parameters.description: (Optional) Type the game name (E.g. Lab Experiment)

description: Returns Embed with User's badges timestamps

parameters.description: Type Valid Roblox Username

parameters.name: TimeMode

name: curren-research-level

actions.name: Run Script

description: Returns number of Research needed for leveling up.

parameters.name: current-level
parameters.description: type your current level

parameters.name: current-research
parameters.description: Insert the number of research you currently have

name: level-research

actions.name: Run Script

parameters.name: current-level
parameters.description: type the current number of levels you have

parameters.name: goal-level
parameters.description: type the level you want to reach

description: Find out how many research you need to reach certain level

name: rebirth

actions.name: Run Script

parameters.name: current-rebirth
parameters.description: type the current rebirth you have now

parameters.name: goal-rebirth
parameters.description: type the number of rebirths you want to reach

parameters.name: average-credits-per-game
parameters.description: type the average number of credits you get per 1 round (include winning credits)

description: Returns the number of Credits, Research and number oRounds you need to reach certain Rebirth
